code: export var BASE_URL='http://api.strezh.dmitrij.students.nomoreparties.space';var checkResponse=function checkResponse(res){return res.ok?res.json():Promise.reject("Error: ".concat(res.status));};var register=function register(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:'POST',headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(checkResponse);};var authorize=function authorize(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:'POST',headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(checkResponse);};var getContent=function ".concat(token)}}).then(checkResponse);};var postCard=function postCard(token,newCard){return ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify({name:newCard.name,link:newCard.link})}).then(checkResponse);};var patchUserInfo=function patchUserInfo(token,newData){return
